data.text: Nia dama o taane humalia ga hai mee gi nia mogobuna i hongo tenua deelaa,
Dono madahaanau ga haadanga lamalia ga maluagina,
Di maalama e maahina i lodo di gowaa bouli ang gi digau ala e humalia,
E maluagina go tangada dela e dumaalia di wanga ana mee
Mee hagalee madagu ma ga hagalongo gi nia longo huaidu.
Mee hagalee e de nnoomaalia be e madagu,
Mee e wanga dehuia gi digau ala hagaloale,
Digau huaidu gaa mmada gi di mee deenei mo di hagawelewele.
